question.text: You are driving in busy traffic. You want to pull up on the left just after a junction on the left. When should you signal?

explanation.text: You need to signal to let other drivers know your intentions. However, if you indicate too early they may think you are turning left into the junction. Correct timing of the signal is very important to avoid misleading others.

answer.text: As you are passing or just after the junction
Just before you reach the junction
Well before you reach the junction
It would be better not to signal at all
